attributes.action: Exempt Shooting from Covid Lockdown, it is done outside, socially distanced.
attributes.additional_details: Make Shooting am exempt sport under the Covid Lockdown.
attributes.background: Allow the sport of Shooting to continue throughout Covid lockdowns. It is a huge support to the Countryside financially, on health grounds both physical and mental and is a social distancing activity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558048
